title: vElu mayilumE
sahitya:
vElu mayilumE veTri vElu mayilumE evvELaiyilumE vellumE veTri



anupallavi



kAlai mAlaiyumE manamE tUdi kAlan varinumE kandan



caraNam



citra kavi narkkIran tattai tavirtta dhIran gajavatra vIrabhadra vIrabAhu
sOdaran
Aru vaTrava shikharan sucaritra sushikharan vicitra kavi kunjaradAsa mitra
rucikaran shakti
